name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 17, Hengyang, Hunan. An old lady was carrying a bucket of swill and walking on the road with a boy in dirty clothes.
The photographer said that the grandmother seemed to be blind, and a body was tied around the boy's neck to help him lead the way.
The photographer got off the car and talked to the grandmother, but she was unconscious. A fellow villager revealed that the child's father had died and his mother had remarried. The old lady did not let the child go to school because she was afraid that the child would be abducted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 17, the third session of the 14th Jiangxi Provincial People's Congress opened in Nanchang, but the media broadcasting the event closed the comment section. 
Previously, the Li Yixue incident in Nanchang, Jiangxi, had sparked widespread heated discussions at home and abroad.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 18, Baoji, Shaanxi. Construction workers sleep on the floor in the lobby of Xinxiguan Hospital to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 18, Tianjin. A merchant disclosed Meituan's double-edged bill. The customer's order amount was 25 yuan. After deducting the commission, delivery fee, and coupons, the merchant actually received more than 6 yuan.
In addition, the customer's end showed that the distance to the merchant was 4.4 kilometers, but the merchant's end showed that the customer was 6.9 kilometers away from the merchant. Meituan charged the merchant a delivery fee based on the distance of 6.9 kilometers, and if the order was not placed, the merchant would be punished by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 18, Zhejiang. A migrant worker who was owed wages stood on a tower crane and shouted at the top of his lungs.
